entries.title: 5 hidden gems you may have missed in 2022
entries.description: Including a stylish shooter on roller skates, a relaxing puzzle game about trains, and a ridiculous pixel adventure.

entries.title: Valorant game director Joe Ziegler leaves Riot for Bungie
entries.description: Ziegler is now a game director at Destiny 2 studio Bungie, but on what game?

entries.title: Musk's Twitter meltdown reeks of '00s forum mod tantrums
entries.description: Having lived through dozens of subreddit dramas and imploded internet discussion boards, the last two months of Twitter have that air about them.

entries.title: Wolfenstein: The New Order is free on the Epic Games Store
entries.description: Machinegames' outstanding Wolfenstein reboot is today's Epic Store freebie.

entries.title: Risk of Rain Returns is 'a whole new game' and final farewell from Hopoo Games
entries.description: The updated and enhanced version of the 2013 roguelike platformer will be Hopoo Games final take on the series.

entries.title: Nvidia really wants you to smell good
entries.description: Sphynx: Ampere is supposed to bring you "extreme freshness" during this stressful holiday season.

entries.title: Sony's solution to poor DualSense Edge wireless battery life: Plug it in
entries.description: You couldn't make this stuff up...

entries.title: Support charity and win a set of Winter Wonderland gaming peripherals by entering our giveaway!
entries.description: It's the most wonderful time to win gear.

entries.title: How to get the Lost Tuskarr Kite in WoW: Dragonflight
entries.description: This Waking Shores quest can be tricky.

entries.title: Nvidia's AI-generated photo-based graphics will blow your tiny mind
entries.description: Nvidia is using NeRFs to generate full 3D graphics from a handful of images.

entries.title: Internet squared: After meme-crashing the Game Awards, 'reformed orthodox rabbi' Bill Clinton comes to Elden Ring
entries.description: I did not have sexual relations with that Elden Ring.

entries.title: FIFA 23 predicted the winner of the world cup in November
entries.description: This is the fourth world cup in a row the simulation's called it.

entries.title: How to craft a Dead Raiser in Valheim
entries.description: Have a skeleton help you in battle.

entries.title: AMD dismisses reports of RDNA 3 graphics bugs
entries.description: Shader pre-fetch in 7900 XT and XTX graphics works just fine, thanks.

entries.title: The Witcher 3 next-gen re-release solidifies its status as my eternal GOTY
entries.description: Why play new games when The Witcher 3 got a shiny next-gen update?

entries.title: Best Early Access 2022: Disney Dreamlight Valley
entries.description: Finally, a great Animal Crossing alternative comes to PC.

entries.title: Signalis turns survival horror into a dreamlike experience I can't forget
entries.description: Rose Engine's psychological thriller breaks the rules with purpose.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 549 answer and hint for Tuesday, December 20
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #549 puzzle.
